alert.note: Alert for Madison (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 23 at 8:56PM CDT until March 23 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT FOR MADISON COUNTY IN SOUTHEASTERN MISSOURI... At 854 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over mainly rural areas of northern Madison County, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fredericktown, Junction City, Cobalt, Roselle, Mine La Motte and Catherine Place. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
